Articles.Content:
We are combing over the ones from the steam store page in a discord that I belong to analyzing everything. Very nice. 

One of the biggest things we are going to have to do on release is to tell Intercept Games what we like because it seems like we as humans love to focus on the negative instead of the positive.

Edited January 6, 2023 by Vanamonde
Some comments removed. Keep it on-topic, please.
